# random canvas fingerprint
randomCanvas.js application/javascript
(function() {
	const sample = ''
	const randomized = sample
		.split('')
		.sort(() => 0.5-Math.random())
		.join('')
		
	const dataURL = 'data:image/png;base64,'+randomized
	
	Object.defineProperty(
	  HTMLCanvasElement.prototype,
	  'toDataURL', 
	  { value: () => { alert('HTMLCanvasElement.toDataURL'); return dataURL }
	)
})()
